attributes.action: Brexit negotiations must partition the UK into EU and non-EU areas.
attributes.additional_details:
The Brexit referendum result has split the UK irreconcilably and damaged it's reputation internationally. Over 16 million people do not want this. It has left people, businesses & financial markets living with great uncertainty. It is tearing the UK apart with no sign of reconciliation.

The only way forward is to partition the UK into EU and non-EU areas. This reflects the reality for many people who have dual nationality & the likely outcome of Scottish independence.
attributes.background: Partitioning the UK is the only way to fully reflect the will of the people demonstrated in the Brexit vote. It is particularly fair to the many citizens who wish to remain in the EU but who are not eligible for either dual nationality or a likely separate independence referendum.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by "partition" in this context, or how you would like the Government to decide which areas of the UK should remain part of the EU.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
